short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dark terminal-esque new tab page with your bookmarks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is a replacement for your new-tab page so that when you create a new tab (via Cmd/Ctrl + T or "+" in the toolbar) you can see a list of all your bookmarks. The bookmarks are shown as links and laid out as columns in a dark themed computer terminal-style. Customisation of the links involves simply editing your bookmarks. This extension is built as an Web Extension and open sourced here â€“ https://github.com/jaywick/hello-friend
